nodes.text: Tevar Shan was a Human male and owner of Ronto-Rama Farms on Tatooine and partial owner of Eopies Extraordinaire. He approached Leia Organa Solo at the Grand Event Center on Coruscant during the annual Coruscant Livestock Exchange and Exhibition to try to sell her both, and was politely turned down.
Tevar Shan was created by author Christie Golden for her first Star Wars novel, and the second novel in the nine-part Fate of the Jedi series, Fate of the Jedi: Omen.
